message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the majority, but I want to make sure you get something too.  Hopefully, we can come to a better agreement in the future.
Alice, your offer was quite cheeky! Let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. It's a good deal considering the inflation.
Let's be more reasonable this time, Bob.  I'm willing to give up a bit more to get this done, but I'm not going to accept another lopsided deal in my favor.  This is a good compromise.
Alice, we're running out of time, and the money is literally evaporating! My last offer was generous. I'm adjusting it slightly, but this is as high as I'm willing to go. Take it or leave it.
